title: CHroma LP sale
body: I know there are two chroma lp sales, and one of them was in march-april. When is the next one?

replies.body: It doesn't look like we've officially announced the dates for the next Chroma IP Sale, but you can be sure to know when it's announced by checking our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) or the [**Chroma Pack FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204475264-Chromas-Packs-FAQ).
